snippet: The economic reports were released as the Labor Department said the Consumer Price Index remained steady in June.
abstract: Labor Department reports show that consumer prices were flat in June, offering some relief for Americans and room for the Federal Reserve to act; unchanged Consumer Price Index is in line with economists' expectations.
lead_paragraph: The economic reports were released as the Labor Department said the Consumer Price Index remained steady in June.

headline.main: New Data Shows Growth Remains Tepid
headline.print_headline: New Data Shows Growth Remains Tepid
